original: tesaṁ tattha vacīsaṅkhāro ca nuppajjittha cittasaṅkhāro ca nuppajjissati.
analyzed: tesam tattha vacī saṅkhāro ca nuppajjittha citta saṅkhāro ca nuppajjissati

original: Yassa vā pana yattha cittasaṅkhāro nuppajjissati tassa tattha vacīsaṅkhāro nuppajjitthāti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha citta saṅkhāraḥ nuppajjissati tassa tattha vacī saṅkhāraḥ nuppajjittha ati

original: Savitakkasavicārabhūmiyaṁ pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ tesaṁ tattha cittasaṅkhāro nuppajjissati,
analyzed: sa vitakka sa vicāra bhūmiyam pacchima citta samaṅgīnam tesam tattha citta saṅkhāro nuppajjissati

original: no ca tesaṁ tattha vacīsaṅkhāro nuppajjittha. Avitakkaavicārabhūmiyaṁ pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ
analyzed: no ca tesam tattha vacī saṅkhāro nuppajjittha avitakka avicāra bhūmiyam

original: asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha cittasaṅkhāro ca nuppajjissati vacīsaṅkhāro ca nuppajjittha.
analyzed: asaññasattānam tesam tattha citta saṅkhāro ca nuppajjissati vacī saṅkhāro ca nuppajjittha

original: Uppādavāro.
analyzed: uppāda vāraḥ
